Articles.Content: Okay so a long time ago  i docked a ship with a station so i could put kerbals on it. I left it there for awhile and when i came back for another crew transfer the docking port was broken. I cannot undock. There is no "Undock" button anymore. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Is there electric charge?

I would try undocking in both ships, ive sometimes found that the ship I wanted to undock couldn't, but I could 'undock' the station from the ship..

If those don't work, might want to post a pic..
